Has no one else experienced this, or did I just miss the existing issue for it? https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4342

[UX] Modal popups jump to the top of the page when opened 路 Issue #4342 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug When you open a modal popup (e.g. the Image Library browser), the page behind the modal jumps up to the top of the page and, when you close the modal, you have to scroll back...
I've seen it. I thought an issue had already been opened for it, but I never looked for it.
